content:
The Annual Great Brews Beer Festival

November 19-20, 2016

Two days. Twice the fun!

This is the beer event of the season! Food, live music, and BEER!

There will be live musical entertainment, giveaways, beer games, food and craft vendors, and of course, BEER! With crisp hard ciders, smooth stouts, hoppy IPAs, pale ales, and even sour beer features on Sour Sunday, there's a beer flavor for everyone!


BUY TICKETS
